author: ultimatelegofanUK
title: SuperFun to Customized,with AWESOME new parts
review:
This is definitely a very AWESOME set!AWESOME minifigures,AWESOME vehicle,AWESOME Bank Vault.......

This incorporated a new design I have never,if rarely seen before.It has a central build consisting of parts,then the "Wheels" are connected via connector bits and then builds on....The building experience was very enjoyful,especially when I built the vehicle.

The minifigures and bank vault was a cool addition to the set,just like the the retired theme "Space Police" back in the 2000s that had space police in spaceships catching criminals.The bank vault was actually cool,as the architecture was very unique in this set!

The AppBrick,which is a lego piece used  for the ULTRA Agents App,was a first-of-it's-kind that I have seen so far and so far,I haven't seen any other themes with this device.I am dying to try it out!'

It was very fun to play with,as you can easily take apart the shape and turn it into a new design.For the Imaginative mind,this is for YOU!

The monetary value I am sure is justified,with all these cool features,it is a great set!

Overall,very cool set with interesting design,and unique parts that make this a special!
